body: Hi, I updated my Honeybee and Ladybug but somehow the solve adjacencies component is responding unusually. A simple example is provided below. Can someone help to find what is wrong here? [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KZdONCIBf2C1bQMvUnSnUL7DLko0*kIwi9h*jyQ5X9eZ6GZuwIOlU9GXh9DOHfph1YToiLxIUPxBNU2j5ebj2kP6-1B9ulC9/Capture.JPG) Zuhaib Rhino [Solve_adjacencies.3dm](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KZdONCIBf2AoS3XHzR*YmGS8CgehAEPXnsAF3na1nexvtojm8E*psyd6hxWiw0AyzCb*Jmf6x4LjwnsYGLBZn28q886ACXm5/Solve_adjacencies.3dm) Grasshopper file: [Honeybee_solveadjacencies.gh](http://api.ning.com:80/files/KZdONCIBf2Bp9VzYZVUvHKXJb1BH23ykbe6NLejf2FcHvOEW4Xo8DCbTZ7xO2xwd29bYJ033TYLHOfpkS6LsVckuZoHpKMUd/Honeybee_solveadjacencies.gh)

replies.body:
Hi Zuhaib,

Please internalise your brep then save file. and upload that again.

right-click on brep set the internalise data.

best,

Omid
Same idea,  it seems to work fine when I assigned the same geometry from your Rhino file..

Zuhaib,

Edit:

It works for me. please find attached.

best,

Omid

Thanks Omid,



There is some problem in the honeybee installation I suppose. Your file shows the same problem in my system. Thanks for help guys.

Hi, I tried rectifying this problem but even in my other grasshopper scripts, it shows the same error. I am unable to locate the source of the problem.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/3oGPmu924*NQg8AR5pR6-1WXv3rUMDaTm0mIAKRE3nG59a1YOfM*61xRTpfQkm94jNyne55PGvqVh3LtyMeDjt2LIUAYAHEu/Capture.JPG)Regards Zuhaib

Zuhaib,

Have you checked these discussions?

1.[this](http://http//www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/honeybee-askme-give-strange-error?xg_source=activity) and 2.[this](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/value-cannot-be-null-parameter-name-source) one.



best,

Omid.

Hi Omid,

Thanks. I figured it out as my Rhino version was previously 32bit before updating LB+HB so the scripts were showing this problem with Solve_adjacencies component. The moment I ran the script with 64bit the error was gone.



Regards

Zuhaib
